description: One thing that I like about my job is that I get so close to a boy´s living. They have to let me into their private surroundings. I can see more about their character and living when I come there than anybody else could ever know when he sees him on the street. In this case I got a call from a - I would say not so "educated" - young man who had problems to even describe his problems on the phone. So we met that very evening in his apartment. He was an easy guy, yet nice. And he was a boxer as well. I get really turned on when I see that the boys do some sport. We talked about his debts and I offered him my help. First I told him to undress. Then he had to show me some boxing moves. As a start.
title: Debt Dandy 21
